content: a simple pattern for an easy crocheted stash basket crocheted using an 18ply or other super bulky yarn and a 6mm hook it is dense enough to support itself use it to hold your current project some of your favourite yarn or household items that just need a nice home instructions are for a basket that is 15 5cm high and 19cm across the base you could easily stop sooner for a smaller basket or just keep going and make it bigger
